chapter.text: You quietly begin to push and shove the equipment away. ^1500You suddenly feel a chill down your spine. ^1500You hear loud footsteps grow closer from the hall outside. ^1500Your pace quickens. ^1500As you frantically remove the equipment from the blockade, you can’t help but feel like this is familiar. ^1500You hear the gym door slowly creek open. ^1500Your heart rate climbs. ^1500You hear the monster’s footsteps as it walks closer.
